title: Help
body: Hi can someone tell me where I can get information on when skins are being given out for free or RP websites other than league news sometimes things are free but RIOT doesn't acknowledge them such as the free mad scientist ziggs skin hen you spend like $10 at eb games I messaged league about it and they said they don't know anything about it, so if there is a website that updates information about way to get free skins or rp please tell me in the comments much appreciated.

replies.body:
Most of those are just scams. Save money and buy what you want legitimately. 

Not a very exciting suggestion sorry. But true.

Well if you got $200 taken from your bank in Australia you can actually go to the bank and say I didn't authorise this transaction and they will reverse the charges back to your bank account. But for the most part the legit skins from pax and all those events are big popular things and eb games is atleast reputable enough not to scam you, perhaps charge you like double price any other gamer store would but that's another matter. If you're going to get pulled into something that seems a little sketch you can type it into google and see if any other forums have reviewed it or another persons posted about it and yeah just never give out your account info because legit things wouldn't ask for it.

um bud all of these free rp and skins are all scams to get into your computer for docs or just some dick making a website saying free rp or skins and next thing you know you got a bug on your computer or lost $200 from your bank account trust me I know

Just gotta get involved in stuff. Like riot will post about free stuff they offer but it's not really up to them to keep up with free skins from other sources. No single website could do that. You just gotta keep checking things like reddit, go to events like PAX, keep checking things via random google searches and it is a little tough but yeah. Also build a community of friends who also care about these skins and they'll probably let you in on any they become aware of.
